Hiii

I'm Rajeev Verma
a Node.Js Developer

Currently pursuing my Masters in Computer Applications (MCA) with focus on node.js development , I am eager to begin my career as a node.js developer. I am particularly interested in utilizing my skills in serverless technology, the express framework, and html create efficient, scalable web applications. Throughout my academic journey , I have gained valuable experience in Node. js, javascript, MongoDB, and AWS services. I have also actively participated in hackathons and personal projects, where I have successfully applied my knowledge to create innovative solutions.

The code handles user creation and retrieval. It validates input data, updates existing users or creates new ones, fetches external data, generates JWT tokens, and retrieves user data based on the provided ID.
